column5: This just popped up in my feed this morning and I wanted to make sure y'all knew about it. Seems there are issues with CO entering the cabin on some Ford Explorers. A police officer passed out @ the wheel because of it this week.  http://www.kvue.com/news/local/carbon-monoxide-detectors-apd-ford-explorers/424034820
Not to make fun of a possible serious issue, did he have white powder around his lips, maybe a sugar rush.
